sub_title: General Manager | Marketing Executive | Start-up Advisor
summary:
Executive business leader, passionate about developing great businesses and teams. From market management across the globe, to transformational leadership of a Philips division in India, to getting a start-up off the ground and profitable. I bring a breadth of management and practical experience, taking strategy to delivery and simplifying the complex. With 20 years of managing and optimising a P&L, I am a seasoned business leader with global experience. 

 Specialties: Growing businesses | General Management | Marketing Strategy | Market Development | Insight development | Product Development 

Global experience in SaaS, FMCG, Consumer Durables, Consumer Electronics and Lighting industries

education.field_of_study: Management Studies; Marketing and International Management

awards.title: New Zealand Young Marketer of the Year
awards.description: Chosen as Young and Rubicon Young Marketer of the Year from entrants across New Zealand. Featured in New Zealand Marketing Magazine

projects.title: Based on Consumer Insight : The launch of Philips Cinema TV 21:9
projects.description: In 2009 Philips Television launched the worlds first Television with the 21:9 aspect ratio to deliver the full cinematic viewing experience ("no more black bars on top and below the movie screen"). Our team of product management, R&D and Consumer Research (CMI) worked on this product since more than 2 years. It is based on the validated insight that people who like to watch the movie at home don't like the " black bars" above and below the movie screen. Why not see the entire picture as the director shot it? This television was another innovation by Philips filling an unmet need of millions of movie lovers who watch movies at home. The link attached shows the viral online campaign "Carrousel" which made the television popular across entire Europe within weeks.

contributors.headline: General Manager | Marketing Executive | Start-up Advisor
CEO & VP Offshore Development RWE Renewables Denmark
Senior Partner, Strategy & Provocation at Born Ugly
Managing Director at Euronics International Ltd.

profile_positions.description:
Catawiki is the most-visited curated marketplace for special objects in Europe. Every week, the platform puts on offer 65,000 items from around the globe, in more than 80 categories such as collectables, art, design, jewellery, watches, classic cars and more.

Responsible for the strategic and commercial development of the Collectables business. 

Lead a team of 100+ passionate experts who are knowledgeable in their areas of expertise - from Fossils to Hifi, Bullion to Pokemon cards, Books to Cameras, and Comics to Sports Memorabilia (and more) they help us to source and curate the special objects that we help into new homes every week. 

Our (growing) sales team partners with sellers across Europe to bring scale to their business and regular cashflow by offering a European wide network of buyers that are interested in adding special objects to their home or collection. We also aid charities and sports clubs such as the Johan Cruijff foundation, UEFA foundation, and Andrea Bocelli Foundation with their fundraising by hosting auctions for their special objects as part of their fundraising efforts.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Collectables

profile_positions.description:
Lead the Collector Category within Collectables. 

My team of 65 passionate Experts is spread across Europe and works with sellers to Curate special items of Comics, Coins, Stamps, Books, Natural History and Finds, and Militaria.
profile_positions.title: Senior Category Director Collector

profile_positions.description:
ResolvePay is a start-up bringing technology solutions to take the stress out of Holiday Pay. Combining industry expertise with smart technology, ResolvePay takes the hassle out of calculating historical and current leave entitlements, ensuring companies are in compliance with their obligations. 

As a member of the Advisory Board I provide mentorship and strategic advice for developing the company.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description: Flying Kiwi Angels is a network of 50+ active angel investors from diverse backgrounds and interests with a genuine passion for helping NZ startups with know-how, connections and funding. Flying Kiwi works at grassroots level with founders to grow their business and become investment ready.
profile_positions.title: Angel Investor

profile_positions.description: Comvita exists to heal and protect the world by working in harmony with bees and nature in New Zealand With a focus on Manuka Honey, Bee Propolis and Olive Leaf Extract, it exports to Asia, North America, Europe, and with home markets in New Zealand and Australia.
profile_positions.title: Chief Customer Officer

profile_positions.description: A SaaS plus hardware business, I took it from idea to strategic plan to launch and first 150 customers. Built on a platform of direct to customer sales driven by digital marketing, EROAD Where is scaling, with a pipeline of both SaaS and hardware product launches in the works.
profile_positions.title: General Manager EROAD Where

profile_positions.description: EROAD is a global leader in road charging, compliance and regulatory telematics services. Responsible for developing marketing competencies across the markets, I lead a team of marketeers based in Auckland, New Zealand and Portland, Oregon who are transforming marketing at EROAD to digital competencies, and moving our business up market towards Enterprise.

profile_positions.description:
Member of the Fisher & Paykel Appliances Executive Leadership team. Responsible for leading the design, development and execution of the global marketing and brand strategy for all customer touch-points (including digital) across Fisher & Paykel Appliances global markets and channels.

Responsible for the Central Marketing team spanning Digital (front and back end developers), Content (mac operators and designers), Shopper Marketing (In-store and Event), Communications (Campaign development), and Market Intelligence, plus local marketing teams located in New Zealand, Australia, USA, UK and Singapore .
profile_positions.title: Chief Marketing Officer (EVP)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for growing B2C Sales (Branded Retail, Modern Retail and Online) across Asia, Pacific, India, Middle East, Turkey, Africa, Russia and Central Asia. Member of the Lighting Growth Markets Management Team.  Lead a team of 50 
- Improved the Mass Market Retail key account planning, business analysis and shopper marketing competencies.
- Developed the Return on Investment Model for Branded Retail to improve the partner and Philips' profitability. Grew Branded Retail by 20%.
- Lead the Shopper Marketing Team for improving Space Management and Category Management approaches across Growth Markets
- Developed a strong Consumer Sales Team, both in the countries and in my direct team
profile_positions.title: Senior Director, Head of Consumer Lighting Sales, Channel Development & Shopper Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Challenge: to grow the Philips Consumer Luminaires business across Asia, Pacific, India, Middle East, Africa, Russia and Central Europe. Improve profitability and portfolio relevance.
Member of the Lighting Growth Markets Management Team
Led a team of 20
profile_positions.title: Senior Director, Head of Business Development, Consumer Luminaires, Growth Markets

profile_positions.description:
· Challenge: to grow Philips Domestic Appliances (Kitchen, Ironing and Vacuuming Appliances) business and turn the business around to profitability
· Launch Espresso and Drip Filter Coffee business in India
· Managed the complete end to end business - from new product development to sales and marketing for Philips Kitchen Appliances and Garment Care, through a team of 40 reports.
· Member of the Philips Consumer Lifestyle India Management team
Key Highlights include:
· Exceeded sales targets – >30% growth in key categories
· Doubled ISM and led the business to EBIT level profitability
· Developed a structured value engineering approach for Garment Care which delivered IGM improvement >5% points – Philips Business Improvement Competition finalist
· Developed an integrated marketing communications campaign for Kitchen Appliances which delivered strong ROI and growth in the campaign period
· Conducted extensive consumer research in the Indian market and developed product, positioning and communication insights on these bases
profile_positions.title: Director, Business Head Domestic Appliances and Coffee India

profile_positions.description:
Cinema 21:9, DesignLine TV, 3D TV, Proposition Excellence Lead for Business Group TV
- Responsible for Product Development for Premium Televisions, and Consumer Insight Development across the full range of TVs globally.  
- Responsible for the proposition development, launch, roadmap and Marketing Communications Development for Cinema 21:9 TV, DesignLine TV and 3D TV ranges
- Managed multi-functional project teams across the Business Unit and Innovation Centres
profile_positions.title: Global Consumer (Product) Marketing Director Televisions

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Kitchen Appliances business in Western and Eastern Europe - €185Mio 
- Regional business strategy development through Annual Plans, Forecasting, and growth plan development for Key Markets.
- Formulated and implemented marketing and growth plans together with local sales organisations to drive value market shares in key product market combinations.
- Developed the global positioning for Kitchen Appliances through explorative consumer research
- Managed reports in the country organisations across Western and Eastern Europe
- Led and developed the Health Marketing campaign which added +40m EUR sales and +4m EUR EBIT
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Manager Kitchen Appliances

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the growth markets of Central Eastern Europe, Russia, China and Middle East Africa - €64Mio business

- Key role in product introduction process, together with marketing communications and Consumer Marketing Management
- Managed reports in Central Eastern Europe, Russia, China and Middle East Africa
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager Food Appliances

profile_positions.description:
Consulting to Multi-national FMCG corporates on strategy projects 

Key Highlights include:
- Developing the innovation processes and teams needed to result in profitable, on strategy innovation within a large multi-national company. Implementation of a "Funnel Process".
- Providing analysis and developing a modelling tool for a multi-national FMCG food company as a basis to develop a three year plan for one of their central categories. Modelling tool later used to analyse strategic options for growth in their other categories.
- Managing the Marketing and Sales side of a project designed to achieve multi-million € savings in the supply chain of a European FMCG Food Company. Developing the pre-conditions for change that would enable the project to realize the savings.
profile_positions.title: Consultant in Strategy and Business Architecture

volunteer_experiences.description: Micro-credit lender through Kiva. Funded over 300 loans to date.

Member of the Ellerslie AFC Football Club Executive Committee. Working on the strategic direction and operational management of the club. 
Ellerslie is a community focused club, serving our community with affordable football and quality player development for boys and girls from 5 years of age through to adults. With 1500 members, it is one of the largest clubs in Auckland.

Flying Kiwi Angels is a network of 50+ active angel investors from diverse backgrounds and interests with a genuine passion for helping NZ startups with know-how, connections and funding. Flying Kiwi works at grassroots level with founders to grow their business and become investment ready.

Business mentor to one of the top 10 finalists in the Zino New Kiwi Challenge; a competition for New Zealand start-up companies founded by immigrant entrepreneurs who are looking to export globally. The competition offers mentoring, networks, and advice to all entrants, and is aimed at fostering the vast talent that moves to New Zealand.
